subject: Enhance website_locations schema with emergency_phone and hours_notes fields
description:
Update the website_locations category config in workflow 8ZN0l9BHo1zBKDnl to add:
- emergency_phone field for 24/7 emergency contact
- hours_notes field for seasonal/holiday variations
- by_appointment flag in hours_of_operation
- Support for array type in hours (split hours like lunch break)
